name: git-worktree-navigator
title: Git Worktree Navigator
description: A Raycast plugin to manage Git worktrees, switch features, and streamline development.
author: john_doe_22

commands.name: index
commands.title: Worktree Navigator
commands.description: Manage Git worktrees and switch features

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
